comments.creator: michael.l.comella@gmail.com
comments.text:
I was building the glean sample app locally (`./gradlew :glean-sample-app:installrelease`) and saw the following log output:
> WARNING: Support for ANDROID_NDK_HOME is deprecated and will be removed in the future. Use android.ndkVersion in build.gradle instead

I'm not sure what the implications of this are.
comments.raw_text:
